function.name: refrigerationTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the temperature of the refrigerator's refrigerating compartment.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the temperature (e.g., refrigerating compartment).

settingTemperature.description: The desired temperature to set for the refrigerating compartment.

predefinedSettingTemperatureUnit.description: The unit of the temperature setting (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
